definition: lit. a single post cannot prop up a falling house (idiom)/fig. one is helpless alone

cow and famous steed at the same trough (idiom); fig. the common and the great are treated alike
precarious as pile of eggs (idiom); ready to fall and break at any moment/in a dangerous state

to grieve for the sick and the dying/to show great concern for people's suffering
